channel.title: Investment on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Investment on FinanClub

item.title: TTD
item.description: score:87 Chances: The Trade Desk Inc. has a strong position in the technology platform for advertising buyers, providing a range of products including audio advertising, mobile advertising, and data management platform. Ark Invest’s continued investment in The Trade Desk Inc. indicates confidence in the company’s future growth potential.

item.title: SHOP
item.description: score:-5 Chances: The internet has continued to propel the exchange of goods and services with Shopify (SHOP) being one of the fastest-growing commerce platforms. In an environment of low market interest rates, growth stocks, especially in the technology sector, such as Shopify, tend to thrive.

item.title: TOST
item.description: score:-93 Chances: The growth-focused money manager added to these three existing positions on Monday. Today’s low-priced stocks may be tomorrow’s wealth-building market darlings. High growth and low risk are a compelling combination. Toast has continued to execute on its mandate to transform the restaurant industry with technology.
